contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Missing ScheduleTasks in Xperience by Kentico? Simply integrate Hangfire
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Milan Sustek, CTO for Kentico Gold partner Bluesoft, wrote a blog post to let developers know it's easy to manage background processes in Xperience by Kentico using Hangfire, a popular open-source background task management library for .NET. Just follow Milan's guide and you'll be up and running in no time.
